You'll have to go on all three dates with each person before they're willing to give you a "special surprise". Make sure to take note of what they like and dislike.
If you want to get a good time on the luge track, you have to know all the turns. What track are you on? How might you be able to figure that out?
The three luge tracks are located in Calgary, Canada; Nagano, Japan; and Sigulda, Latvia.
